home.title: Goteo is more than crowdfunding
home.description_1: Goteo can be used as a barometer for the needs of a more collaborative, transparent society. Our data tells the story, and it's another thing we offer in an open form.
home.description_2: Please have a look at our statistics, visualizing data by sections, years or categories. We're also giving you direct access to our API to create new applications, analyses and visualizations.
